attributes.action: The queen to disolve parliament now
attributes.additional_details: 17.4 million refrences can be seen at the referendum outcome in 2016
attributes.background:
The government of the United kingdom is unfit to maintain what is good for the country and the people.
They are not fit for representing the sovereignty of this democracy

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not clear what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Under the Fixed Terms Parliament Act 2011 the Queen cannot dissolve Parliament.
You might like to sign these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235547 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237487
